products.title: Stirlo Porcelain White
products.description: Stirloporcelain whiteplain roller blind the stirlo range boast a fantastic range of dim-out privacy fabrics to compliment any room. The fabric is composed of 100% polyester and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with white chain used as standard, or a nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing.

products.description: Product id: db-dven0439 fabric colour: porcelain white s25031 material: aluminium headrail: co-ordinating slimline aluminium headrail - face or top fix brackets slat width: 25mm slat material: aluminium control type: cord & wand energy saving rating: er1 - lowest energy saving value - due to blind type or fabric light filtering: yes turin 25mm porcelain white aluminium venetian in white. Made to measure from 8.

products.title: Ecowood, Porcelain Grey Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: The natural grain finish of the ecowood in porcelain grey fine grain makes it perfect for adding the look of authentic painted wood to your home. The silky grey tone is sweet and subtle, as well as completely versatile, matching a wide range of styles and colour schemes. Insert the porcelain grey fine grain into a light decor scheme for a lounge, furnishing the room with white painted wickers, luxe grey fabrics, and minimal metal.

products.title: Konya Blackout Porcelain White
products.description: Konya blackoutporcelain whiteplain roller blind the konya range boasts a huge range of blackout and thermal fabrics to use in any room. The fabric is composed of 100% polyester, with a pvc blackout backing and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with white chain used as standard, or a nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade.

products.title: Ecowood, Porcelain Grey Satin - Venetian Blind
products.description: The ecowood in porcelain grey satin is a pretty yet unassuming piece in a pale dove grey and with a smooth, silky finish. This attractive blind is practical and durable, as well as offering style and sophistication to any room in the home. As for the colour? It matches everything. Give your lounge a contemporary makeover by opting for an ultra-trendy yellow and grey colour scheme. Paint one wall in a sunny yellow tone and the others in a soft white.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Porcelain Grey Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: There's no colour with quite the versatile sophistication of grey, and the ecowood deluxe range's porcelain grey fine grain doesn't let it down. A realistic grain texture sits across the slats, which offer contemporary clean lines as well as practical durability. Coordinate the porcelain grey fine grain with a rich mauve for a stunningly pretty, yet clean and contemporary, look in the guest bedroom.

products.title: Alessi Porcelain Cream 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Their alessi range is a great purchase for a room, the very affordable polyester vertical blinds come in an array of vibrant colours. The textured fabric of this vertical blind is an excellent choice for your space. Snow white will ensure a fresh finish for your space. Product id: sdb-vtb1366 fabric colour: porcelain material: 100% polyester headrail: white slimline headrail supported by white steel brackets - top or face fixable slat width: 89mm control type: smooth chain operation with cord tilt or wand tilt and pull energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes alessi porcelain cream 89mm vertical blind in cream.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Porcelain Grey Satin - Venetian Blind
products.description: The subtle dove grey of the porcelain grey satin, borne from the luxe ecowood deluxe range, is a refreshingly cool shade and sits on a smooth, untarnished surface across wide adjustable slats. Coordinating ladder tapes add to the designer feel. Use the porcelain grey satin as a toning accent to stronger shades, such as deep purple or rich red, in the master or guest bedroom. Paint a feature wall in your key colour, adding the blind as a way of breaking up the block colour, and coordinate accessories in matching colours.

products.title: Wildflower Porcelain
products.description: Wildflower porcelain made to measure roller blind.

products.title: Porcelain Perfect Fit
products.description: This porcelain perfect fit blind, is a combination of their metal venetian blind and perfect fit frame to create an ideal blind for your upvc windows and doors. No screws, no drilling - innovative fixings.

products.title: Calder, Porcelain - Roman Blind
products.description: Transform your home by adding the subtle colour and eye-catching arrangement of the calder in porcelain. This handsome blind is made from a cotton fresh fabric to form a serene feel with a contemporary style. Create a humble and sophisticated look in your master bedroom by combining the porcelain with a soft palette and modern designs. Develop the chalky blue or muted sage green shades with correlating fabrics and cushions, formed on a base of subdued grey for tranquil and elegant feel.

products.title: Langden, Porcelain - Roman Blind
products.description: A light version of cornflower blue, the porcelain features the typical langden patterning, a paisley-inspired delight with a pretty, vintage twist. Combined with the luxury of the roman shape, this sweet pattern is sure to add softness and lightness to any room. Go for a cool yet antiqued look in your master bedroom, settling the porcelain against light walls, french-style furniture, and plush fabrics.
